theory: Enel will return in the final saga to play a significant role due to his connection to the Moon and ancient civilizations. His god complex will lead to conflict with the Celestial Dragons and God's Knights who also claim divinity.
author: Various r/OnePiece users

theory: The Skypiea Arc is one of the most important arcs in One Piece because it foreshadows the World Government's structure. Enel's god complex and absolute authority directly parallels Imu and the Celestial Dragons who claim unquestioned power over the world.
author: One Piece community

theory: Enel's journey to the Moon and his claim that people in the sky are 'unnatural' connects to the lore about the world sinking and the duality of the three worlds (sky, surface, and underwater). This will be important for understanding the Void Century and the true history of the world.
author: One Piece theorists
